assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nippon Dry-Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of fire extinguishing equipment, fire engines, security systems, etc. in Japan and internationally. The company offers various fire extinguishing equipment/systems, including alarm check and deluge valves, and cylinder assembly solutions; specialty solutions, such as pre-engineered fire suppression systems, quick agent spray apparatus, optical fiber heat sensing systems, and fire suppression systems for busses; and building solutions comprising drencher equipment, inert gas fire extinguishing systems, powder fire extinguishers, portable fire extinguishers, sprinkler systems for apartment buildings, consolidated sprinkler systems, carbon dioxide fire extinguishers, automatic fire alarm systems, water ejector sprinkler systems, foam fire extinguishers, indoor/outdoor hydrants, halogen 1301 fire extinguishers, tunnel disaster prevention systems, and consolidated water pipes. It also provides concentrated control systems and system machinery; water spraying, sprinkling, water tent, and monitoring equipment; and fire engines, such as general pumpers, pumper with a water tank, chemical fire engines, dry-chemical fire engines, support vehicles, water tankers with mobile fire pump, and other various fire engines. In addition, the company offers electronics equipment; chemical plant systems; hydrant, air conditioning, and hygine systems; smoke control systems; fire extinguishing agent and emergency equipment; and fire protection systems and equipment. Further, it provides maintenance and inspection services of fire protection systems. Nippon Dry-Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1955 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
